title: Xian Ji Xun Zong
overview: Lu Fan, a biology student at Jiangxia University, was once a second-generation rich heir. However, after his parents mysteriously disappeared, the company changed ownership, and his girlfriend betrayed him, he lost everything overnight. To make matters worse, he inherited his father's massive debts. With no way out, he hid in his old family home and unexpectedly discovered an immortal living in a bonsai tree, from whom he obtained a cultivation manual. To find his missing father, Lu Fan embarks on an adventurous journey.
